name: Cleffa
author: sui
flavor_text: Because of its unusual, star-like silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.

poke_body.name: Sweet Sleeping Face
poke_body.effect: As long as Cleffa is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Cleffa by attacks.

attacks.name: Eeeeeeek
attacks.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 6 cards. Cleffa is now Asleep.
